directions: Simmer water and sugar, stirring, until sugar is dissolved. Remove from heat and stir in tea bag and zest. Steep 5 minutes, then discard tea bag. Chill syrup until cold.
Stir peaches into chilled syrup and serve with scoops of sorbet.
ingredients: 1 large white peach, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 large yellow peach, peeled and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 pint peach sorbet or ice cream
title: Peach Soup
